title: Unconditional
description: It only takes one moment to change the course of someone’s life. One moment to link two souls forever.  That moment came when I pulled her out of her darkest hour. The tragedy that threatened to swallow her whole and shatter her innocence.  Save her. Protect her. Love her. I vowed.  Ten years later, my vows are the same.  But I’m different She’s different We’re different.  And the feelings threatening to break free have the power to destroy everything.  I’ll stop at nothing to keep her safe, but what if the very thing she needs protection from ...is me?
author: Q.B. Tyler
